GSD.product_version: versions from v3.3 to before v4.4.272
GSD.description:
net: caif: fix memory leak in caif_device_notify

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.4.272 by commit b042e2b2039565eb8f0eb51c14fbe1ef463c8cd8, it was introduced in version v3.3 by commit 7c18d2205ea76eef9674e59e1ecae4f332a53e9e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: caif: fix memory leak in caif_device_notify
